description: This East Sussex village is located near Winchelsea and Rye in the Rother district of the county. This circular walk from the village uses part of the 1066 Country Walk to visit neighbouring Winchelsea . The return leg includes a pleasant waterside section along the Royal Military Canal Path . Please scroll down for the full list of walks near and around Icklesham. The detailed maps below also show a range of footpaths, bridleways and cycle paths in the area.
